name: quality refillable lighter
description: This is a lighter that has been modified to output a larger flame than normal lighters.  While ideal for starting fires, and able to start them faster, it is a bit of a fuel hog, consuming it almost twice as fast.

name: wearable lighter
description: A lighter with a bit of string and taping to allow it to be worn about the neck like a lanyard.

name: pocket-creature warp container
description: Creature holding container in the form of a  small ball based on highly experimental PRM warp packing technology. Allows the safe transport of creatures; but seems to conserve weight, making its use impractical.

name: chinese digging tool
description: A sturdy spade made from cheap steel.  The spade's edge has been sharpened and its joints are tapered into a fine enough point to cut through wire.

name: broken firebomb hack
description: A broken firebomb hack.  Much less threatening now that it lies quiet on solid ground.  Could be gutted for parts.

name: inactive firebomb hack
description: This is an inactive firebomb hack.  When activated it will fly into a hostile and detonate, showering the area with flame.

use_action.friendly_msg: The firebomb hack flies from your hand and surveys the area!
use_action.hostile_msg: You mis-program the firebomb hack; take cover!

name: polyplastic chunk
description: This is a piece of lightweight, micro-layered space age plastic.  It is unlikely it will ever be manufactured again, so it's got to be worth something to somebody.

name: revenant rocket
description: A revenant's rocket.  Will home in on a target and explode for moderate damage and a small EMP blast.

use_action.hostile_msg: You mis-program the missile; it's hostile!

name: revenant rocket core
description: The core of a revenant's rocket, exposed to the air.  Seems stable enough at the moment, but will likely explode if you mess with it.

name: unstable revenant rocket core
description: The core of a revenant's rocket, exposed to the air.  Will likely explode any moment now.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: There's a hole in this core; it's gonna blow!

name: glowing soulcube
description: An unknown cube-shaped device of obviously alien origin, it's purpose is unknown.

use_action.msg: The glow transfers over to you, healing your wounds!

name: healing soulcube
description: An unknown cube-shaped device of obviously alien origin, it's purpose is unknown.

name: recharging soulcube
description: An unknown cube-shaped device of obviously alien origin, it's purpose is unknown.

use_action.not_ready_msg: You fiddle with the cube, but nothing happens.

name: soulcube
description: An unknown cube-shaped device of obviously alien origin, it's purpose is unknown.

use_action.friendly_msg: As you fiddle with the cube, it flies from your hands!
use_action.hostile_msg: Oh, it's hostile. That's probably not supposed to happen.  Probably.

name: incubating boil bomb
description: A canister with a wad of fungus growing inside.  When it finishes incubating, it will be ready to release.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The boil requires 36 hours to mature.  It is not ready yet.

name: inactive shockcannon turret
description: This is an inactive shockcannon turret.  Using this item involves turning it on and placing it on the ground, where it will attach itself.  The turret will then identify you as a friendly, and requires 100 batteries per discharge.  Any batteries within you inventory will be used to power the turret when you place it.

name: sap grenade
description: Extract from a biollante's budding flowers, diluted with a weak acid water.  When thrown it will produce a fast-thickening goop that will trap whatever walks into it.

name: sap grenade
description: Extract from a biollante's budding flowers, diluted with a weak acid water.  When thrown it will produce a fast-thickening goop that will trap whatever walks into it.

name: inactive helicopter drone
description: This helicopter drone is awaiting resupply and reactivation.  If you have .223 ammunition or equivalent on your person when you activate it it will be armed with it and fly off to use it on something up to 16 tiles away.

name: broken helicopter drone
description: A broken helicopter drone.  Much less ominous now.
